content:
In Germany, the next meeting of the Contact Group on Military Assistance to Ukraine in Ramstein format will be held on March 19.

About it reports the Armyinform.

The 20th meeting of allies will be held on Tuesday. The meeting place is the German military-air base Ramstein ab.

The meeting will be headed by the head of the Pentagon Lloyd Austin. This is the first international journey for Lloyd Austin after his recent hospitalizations.

Together with him, the chairman of the Joint Committee of US Chiefs of Staff, General Charles Quinton Brown Jr., arrived at Ramstein.

In general, ministers of defense and higher military officials from about 50 countries have been invited to the meeting.

Lloyd Austin on the eve of Ramstayne-20, the coalition will focus on the urgent needs of Ukraine on the battlefield and long-term security. After the meeting, the Pentagon Head is scheduled.

As reported by the Armyinform, Rustem Umerov and Alexander SirskydiscussedWith the head of the Pentagon preparation for Ramstin.
title: The Ramstein-20 meeting will be held today in Germany today
description: About it reports the Armyinform. The 20th meeting of allies will be held on Tuesday. Place...
author: Army Inform
